author: wn.com
title: Fascinating Life of Rev. Albert Fay Hill '50 Recalled in Denver Post (DePauw University)
text: ( Source : DePauw University ) October 19 , 2015 The colorful and fascinating life of Albert Fay Hill , 'a Presbyterian minister whose back story includes a battle with the New York mob that inspired a Disney movie ,' is told in a Denver Post
